scripts.dev: pnpm dlx cross-env mode=alpha nuxt dev
scripts.build:alpha: pnpm dlx cross-env mode=alpha nuxt build
scripts.build:beta: pnpm dlx cross-env mode=beta nuxt build
scripts.build:stable: pnpm dlx cross-env mode=production nuxt build
scripts.generate:alpha: pnpm dlx cross-env mode=alpha nuxt build
scripts.generate:beta: pnpm dlx cross-env mode=beta nuxt build
scripts.generate:stable: pnpm dlx cross-env mode=production nuxt build
scripts.mci: git pull && pnpm i && pnpm build:alpha
